functionDecorators.name: addIntegration
functionDecorators.description: GOVERNANCE FUNCTION: Add a new integration to the registry.

parameterDecorators.name: _module
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the module associated with the integration.

parameterDecorators.name: _name
parameterDecorators.description: Human readable string identifying the integration.

parameterDecorators.name: _adapter
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the adapter contract to add.

functionDecorators.name: batchAddIntegration
functionDecorators.description: GOVERNANCE FUNCTION: Batch add new adapters. Reverts if exists on any module and name.

parameterDecorators.name: _modules
parameterDecorators.description: Array of addresses of the modules associated with integration.

parameterDecorators.name: _names
parameterDecorators.description: Array of human readable strings identifying the integration.

parameterDecorators.name: _adapters
parameterDecorators.description: Array of addresses of the adapter contracts to add.

functionDecorators.name: batchEditIntegration
functionDecorators.description: GOVERNANCE FUNCTION: Batch edit adapters for modules. Reverts if module and adapter name don't map to an adapter address.

parameterDecorators.name: _modules
parameterDecorators.description: Array of addresses of the modules associated with integration.

parameterDecorators.name: _names
parameterDecorators.description: Array of human readable strings identifying the integration.

parameterDecorators.name: _adapters
parameterDecorators.description: Array of addresses of the adapter contracts to add.

functionDecorators.name: editIntegration
functionDecorators.description: GOVERNANCE FUNCTION: Edit an existing integration on the registry.

parameterDecorators.name: _module
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the module associated with the integration.

parameterDecorators.name: _name
parameterDecorators.description: Human readable string identifying the integration.

parameterDecorators.name: _adapter
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the adapter contract to edit.

functionDecorators.name: getIntegrationAdapter
functionDecorators.description: Get integration adapter address associated with passed human readable name.

parameterDecorators.name: _module
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the module associated with the integration.

parameterDecorators.name: _name
parameterDecorators.description: Human readable adapter name.

functionDecorators.name: getIntegrationAdapterWithHash
functionDecorators.description: Get integration adapter address associated with passed hashed name.

parameterDecorators.name: _module
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the module associated with the integration.

parameterDecorators.name: _name_hash
parameterDecorators.description: Hash of human readable adapter name.

functionDecorators.name: isValidIntegration
functionDecorators.description: Check if adapter name is valid.

parameterDecorators.name: _module
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the module associated with the integration.

parameterDecorators.name: _name
parameterDecorators.description: Human readable string identifying the integration.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: removeIntegration
functionDecorators.description: GOVERNANCE FUNCTION: Remove an existing integration on the registry.

parameterDecorators.name: _module
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the module associated with the integration.

parameterDecorators.name: _name
parameterDecorators.description: Human readable string identifying the integration.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
